transcript:
Agent: Hello, is this Mr. Johnson?
Customer: Yes, it is. Who's calling?
Agent: My name is Emily, and I'm calling from GreenTech. We specialize in energy-efficient solutions for homes and businesses.
Customer: Okay, what can you do for me?
Agent: We've recently launched a new line of smart thermostats that can help you save up to 30% on your energy bills.
Customer: That sounds interesting. I've been looking to reduce my energy costs.
Agent: Exactly. Our thermostats are Wi-Fi enabled, allowing you to control the temperature remotely through your smartphone or tablet.
Customer: That's convenient. How much do they cost?
Agent: Our starter package begins at $199, which includes the thermostat and installation.
Customer: That's a bit more than I was expecting. Do you have any promotions or discounts available?
Agent: Actually, we're running a special promotion this month. If you purchase the starter package, we'll throw in a free energy audit, which is a $100 value.
Customer: Okay, that sounds like a good deal. Can you come out to my house to install it next week?
Agent: Let me check our schedule. (pause) Yes, we have an opening on Wednesday or Thursday. Which day works best for you?
Customer: Wednesday would be fine.
Agent: Great, I'll go ahead and schedule the installation for Wednesday. We'll also send you a confirmation email with all the details.
Customer: Sounds good, thank you.
Agent: You're welcome, Mr. Johnson. We look forward to helping you save energy and money.
